function.description:
Returns the index at which `string2` occurs in `string1`. The search starts at index `startPos`.
`startPos` defaults to 0. Returns -1 if the index could not be found.

example.title: Usage
example.code:
use System, String;
System.print(String.indexOf("maxTestTest", "Test")); // Result: 3 System.print(String.indexOf("maxTestTest", "Test", 3)); // Result: 3 System.print(String.indexOf("maxTestTest", "Test", 5)); // Result: 7 System.print(String.indexOf("maxTestTest", "foo")); // Result: -1
